example.eg: Shine the light on the corner.
The sun is really shining today.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 闪亮，发光，照耀, 亮得刺眼

example.eg: She will shine in the competition.
example.egtrans: 她会在竞赛中脱颖而出。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出类拔萃，干得出色，脱颖而出

example.eg: He's not good at explaining it, but he really shines at mathematics.
example.egtrans: 他不善于言语解释，却十分擅长数学。

example.eg: His face will shine with excitement when he opens the gift package.
example.egtrans: 他打开礼物，脸上的表情激动地发光。

example.eg: I hate having to shine the silverware.
example.egtrans: 我不喜欢擦亮银器这种家务活。

example.eg: She polished the silver candlesticks to a dazzling shine.
example.egtrans: 她将银烛台擦得干干净净，泛着耀眼的光泽。

example.eg: My boots really need a shine.
example.egtrans: 我的靴子真的需要擦擦了。

dsense.name: shine out
dsense.guideword: figurative (quality: be strong, easy to see)

example.eg: The team's talent shone out when they easily won the game.
His kindness shines through everything he says.
Whenever she speaks, her intelligence shines through.
Come rain or shine, we are going to the beach tomorrow!
example.egtrans: 无论明天刮风下雨，我们都要去海滩！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 风雨无阻，不论晴雨，不管打雷下雨

example.eg: Come rain or shine, I will never abandon you.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不论如何，不论什么情况

example.eg: The marathon run will take place rain or shine, although it will be postponed if there's lightning.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无论天气如何, 风雨无阻

example.eg: Rise and shine! It's six o'clock and you have to get ready for school.
The research shines a light on the way these animals behave.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使...更清楚, 使...更明白

example.eg: She took a shine to him from the first time they met.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 迷恋某人, 对某人着迷
